name: Lone Sniper: Army Shooter
description:
Lone Sniper: Army Shooter is an exciting and new action game to do some sniper shooting as a sniper real assassin in the gun shooting game of action game 2018. You have to become a sniper shooter and doing sniper commando strike as the fps shooting of becoming a frontline sniper of the gun shooter to do gun swat strike in the sniper game. The role of the fps sniper is not easy so you have to be good in terrorist game. You have to do real enemy strike and clean your city from the terrorist by doing counters gun strike of the sniper 3d game of shooting game in the sniper mission game.

Try to focus on your target and not missed any chance of the sniper shoot to stay in the top shooting game and perform well in the action game all 3d of the shooter game in the combat game of military sniper game. Try to stay in the shooting game as much as you want to enjoy gun shooting game.

Features:
- Ultra REALISTIC 3D graphics and cool animations.
- HUNDREDS of thrilling MISSIONS
- ADDICTING gameplay (FPS).
- EASY and INTUITIVE controls.
- FREE game: play it both on your phone and tablet.
